name: Justice
description:
Play as a ninja in this VR stealth assassination game, your clan has been destroyed and you are the sole remaining ninja in a dystopian Japanese metropolis. You must hunt down, disrupt and assassinate powerful leaders of a crime syndicate responsible for your clans demise and obtain Justice for your clan.Key Features
-Ninja Tools
Use tools to help trap, confuse and kill your enemies.
The environment will provide you with tools to help sneak past obstacles

-Leader boards
After completing each mission, you get a score based on your performance. Compare these against your friends or everyone online.
